mapper.select: SELECT /* com.qs.www.approval.model.dao.ApprovalDAO#selectApprovalLine()*/ A.* FROM TBL_APPROVER_LINE A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{ no }
SELECT /* com.qs.www.approval.model.dao.ApprovalDAO#selectApprovalLine()*/ A.* FROM TBL_APPROVER_LINE A WHERE A.LINE_NO = #{ lineNo }

SELECT /* com.qs.www.approval.model.dao.ApprovalDAO#selectApprovalLine()*/ A.* , C.DEPT_NAME , D.JOB_NAME FROM TBL_APPROVER A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO ) JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT C ON (B.DEPT_CODE = C.DEPT_CODE ) JOIN TBL_JOB D ON (B.JOB_CODE = D.JOB_CODE ) WHERE A.LINE_NO = #{ lineNo } ORDER BY A.PRIORITY
SELECT LAST_NUMBER FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME = 'SEQ_REPORT_NO'
SELECT /* com.qs.www.approval.model.dao.ApprovalDAO#selectMyReport()*/ A.* FROM TBL_REPORT A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{ no } AND 4 > A.DOCUMENT_NO AND REPORT_STATUS != '회수' ORDER BY A.REPORT_NO DESC
SELECT /* com.qs.www.approval.model.dao.ApprovalDAO#selectOneReportDetail()*/ A.* , B.NAME FROM TBL_REPORT A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO ) WHERE A.REPORT_NO = #{ reportNo }
SELECT /* com.qs.www.approval.model.dao.ApprovalDAO#selectReportItemList()*/ A.* FROM TBL_ITEM_CONTENT A WHERE A.REPORT_NO = #{ no } ORDER BY A.PRIORITY

SELECT /* com.qs.www.approval.model.dao.ApprovalDAO#selectALPRList()*/ A.* , B.NAME FROM TBL_APPROVER_LOG_PER_REPORT A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO ) WHERE A.REPORT_NO = #{ no } ORDER BY A.APP_LOG_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE /* com.qs.www.approval.model.dao.ApprovalDAO#callbackSelectedReport"()*/ TBL_REPORT A SET A.REPORT_STATUS = '회수' WHERE A.REPORT_NO = #{ no }
UPDATE /* com.qs.www.approval.model.dao.ApprovalDAO#callbackApproverPerReport()*/ TBL_APPROVER_PER_REPORT A SET A.APPROVER_TYPE = '미처리' WHERE A.REPORT_NO = #{ no } AND A.APPROVER_TYPE = '대기'
mapper.select: SELECT /* com.qs.www.approval.model.dao.ApprovalDAO#selectMyTurnAPR()*/ A.* FROM TBL_APPROVER_PER_REPORT A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{ no } AND A.APPROVER_TYPE = '대기' ORDER BY A.REPORT_NO DESC

SELECT /* com.qs.www.approval.model.dao.ApprovalDAO#selectMyTurnAPR()*/ A.* FROM TBL_APPROVER_PER_REPORT A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{ no } AND A.APPROVER_TYPE NOT IN ('미처리', '대기') ORDER BY A.REPORT_NO DESC

SELECT /* com.qs.www.approval.model.dao.ApprovalDAO##selectMemberList() */ A.MEMBER_NO , A.NAME , A.DEPT_CODE , D.DEPT_NAME , A.JOB_CODE , E.JOB_NAME FROM TBL_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT D ON (A.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE) LEFT JOIN TBL_JOB E ON (A.JOB_CODE = E.JOB_CODE) WHERE A.ENT_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.MEMBER_NO
SELECT LAST_NUMBER FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME = 'SEQ_LINE_NO'
